abstract: South Korea announces its intention to join China-led Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank, despite negative reactions from United States.
lead_paragraph: The United States has expressed misgivings about the proposed lender, Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank, which it sees as a threat to the World Bank.

headline.main: South Korea Plans to Join Regional Development Bank Led by China
headline.print_headline: South Korea Plans to Join Regional Development Bank Led by China

snippet: The United States has expressed misgivings about the proposed lender, Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank, which it sees as a threat to the World Bank.
